title: HELP!!! i have a login error
body:
ok so when ever i try to login it says this

"Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.

Information regarding what may have caused this error can be found here.

Service availability can be viewed on the League of Legends Server Status web page."

Please help i love this game but i cant get on

replies.body:
Your network might be having a hard time talking to our servers specifically. Sometimes your own network can be near perfection, but it can still have troubles reaching certain servers at times. Look over the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so that we can get you back on the rift!

Hit me back up if you have any questions.
